title: Stoke Prior Walks

images.title: Les Hull / Moors Pools Nature Reserve at Upton Warren
images.caption: Moors Pools Nature Reserve at Upton Warren. The northern Moors pools are freshwater lakes formed on previously agricultural land; the great expanse of water attracts a wide range of birds.

images.title: Upton Warren Nature Reserve by David P Howard, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Upton Warren Nature Reserve

images.title: Stoke Prior Church by Rob Newman, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Stoke Prior Church. The church dates to the 12th century.

images.title: Water Depth Gauge, River Salwarpe by Rob Newman, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Water Depth Gauge, River Salwarpe. The river runs through the village.

description: This Worcestershire based village is in a nice spot for country walks and easy strolls along the Worcester and Birmingham Canal. This walk starts from Stoke Wharf and takes you along the canal to visit one of the local highlights at Tardebigge Locks. Here you will find the largest flight of locks in Britan, comprising 30 narrow locks on a 2.25 mile (3.6 km) stretch along the canal. There's also the pretty Tardebigge Reservoir to see in this area. To continue your walking around Stoke Prior head east to visit Upton Warren Nature Reserve. The reserve has some pretty lakes and is said to be Worcestershire’s premier bird-watching reserve. You can find the reserve at postcode B61 7ET. See the video below for more details.

details.subtitle: Pubs/Cafes
details.content: The Priory Cafe is located in a fine canalside spot at Stoke Wharf. You can sit outside and enjoy a lovely meal while watching the boats go by. You can find them at 138 Hanbury Rd, Stoke Prior, Bromsgrove B60 4JZ.

display_address: Hanbury Road, Stoke CP, Stoke Prior, Bromsgrove, Worcestershire, England, B60 4LA, United Kingdom
